import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any = [ { nome: "Angular", Local: "Belo Horizonte" }, { nome: "React", Local: "São Paulo" }, { nome: "Vue JS", Local: "Minas Gerais" }, ] constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
